Application: ASP.NET MVC, Entity 
Framework, NUnit, Log4Net, etc
Windows/Windows Phone Developer
Freelancer

Develop applications on Windows Phone 
8/8.1 and Windows 8.1/10
Bao Tran
Senior DevOps Engineer
OBJECTIVE
Seeking a position as a Senior 
DevOps Engineer so that I can make 
use of my acquired knowledge and 
real experience in the application 
development process.
PROJECTS
CONTACT
KOBITON | DevOps
KOBITON
Description: 
Kobiton is a mobile cloud service which offers mobile 
simulation service on web and mobile lab management for 
enterprises.
Key skills:
AWS | CI/CD | Ansible | Docker | Kubernetes | Helm | 
Docker Compose | Mkdocs | Elastic Stack | Bash Script |  
Python | DevOps Integration | Nginx
Experience: - Work with AWS (IAM, EC2, S3, RDS, Route 53, ECS, EKS,
  SQS, Elastic Transcoder, Direct Connect, CloudWatch)
- Implement CI/CD system using Jenkins, Travis CI, Rundeck
- Work with Ansible as a configuration management tool
- Work with Docker and Kubernetes to deploy, scale,
  and manage containerized application
- Work with Helm as a package manager to manage
  Kubernetes application
- Design, build and maintain Kobiton On-Premise Solution
  based on Docker Compose
- Build On-Premise Installation Guideline using Mkdocs
- Work with Elastic Stack (Elasticsearch, Kibana, Logstash) to
  centralize logs in the operation process
- Build tools using Python, Bash Script for different purposes
- Lead a small team (3 members) to integrate Kobiton with
  the other CI systems (Jenkins, Travis CI, Circle CI, …) 
- Setup and configure Nginx to manage web servers,
  serve static websites and apply SSL certificate
Duration: 
24 months
168/35 Nguyen Cu Trinh Street, 
Nguyen Cu Trinh Ward, District 1, 
Ho Chi Minh City
Address
+84 972 998 128

Sample Azure DevOps Pipeline | DevOps
FREELANCER
Description: 
Build a sample pipeline that will build and deploy a .NET 
Core Console Application to Amazon Container Service 
(ECS)
Key skills:
C# | .NET Core Console Application | Azure DevOps | 
AWS ECS | AWS ECR | Bash Script
Experience: - Define AWS architecture and resources
- Create a sample "Hello World" .NET Core Application
- Write scripts to deploy an application to ECS using awscli
- Build a pipeline to build and deploy the application
- Document the project implementation
Duration: 
1 week
SKILLS
C#/LINQ OOP
AWS CI/CD
.NET CORE
GIT
File Monitoring Tool | DevOps
FREELANCER
Description: 
This is an application that will check whether SFTP files 
were delivered on time. If not, an email will be sent and a 
phone call will be made via Twilio.
Key skills:
C# | .NET Core Web API | .NET Core Console 
Application | AWS SQS | AWS API Gateway | SSH.NET | 
Twilio
Experience: - Use Twilio as a call gateway to make phone call
- Create an endpoint to generate a voice message
- Create a webhook and deploy to AWS API Gateway to get
  call statuses
- Use AWS SQS to handle call statuses between the
  webhook and the file monitoring tool
Duration: 
36 hours
CaaS DBMS
SOFT SKILLS
Fast research
Teamwork
English
Communication
Creative thinking
Design
Jenkins Pipeline for app deployment | DevOps
FREELANCER
Description: 
Build Jenkins Pipeline (using shared library) to build, test, 
deploy Angular 5 and Node Express API to AWS Elastic 
Container Service
Key skills:
Jenkins | S3 | CloudFront | AWS EC2 | AWS ECS | AWS 
ECR | Node.js | Express API | AWS CLI | Bash Script
Experience: - Merge 2 separated repositories (api and frontend) into 1
  repository called apps (monorepo)
- Write script to build and deploy frontend to S3 and
  configure S3 to serve static website (CloudFront)
- Write script to build and deploy api to ECS
- Integrate Jenkins with ECR to push application images
- Build Jenkins Pipeline to build and deploy the application
  to ECS
Duration: 
1 week
Leadership
HOBBIES
Shipping Easy | Backend
THESIS
Description: 
This is a graduation project, full name: Merchandise 
transportation system Shipping Easy. This project looks like 
Grab Delivery.
Key skills:
C# | ASP.NET 5 | Entity Framework 5 | LINQ | SQL Server 
| SignalR | One Signal | HTML | CSS | JavaScript
Experience: - Build a website for store to input order
- Build an API for iOS app (shipper and receiver) to ship/
  receive products
- Build a real-time server using SignalR for shipper location 
  tracking
Duration: 
8 months
